examples: Jonathan always paints an idyllic picture of our childhood, glossing over the bad memories of our father.
Doesn't it sound idyllic?
But it's not all idyllic.
For a lot of marginalized people, the girlhood of Meg, Jo, Beth, and Amy might not be relatable, but it is as idyllic, fantastic, and magical as the idea of getting a letter from Hogwarts.
The tourist industry is painting it as idyllic.
words.defineEn: perfect or idealistic, often in a romantic or nostalgic sense
words.defineVi: hoàn hảo hoặc duy tâm, thường theo nghĩa lãng mạn hoặc hoài cổ

examples: And so this very fast plastic kind of bread, which was really, I guess done out to the well-meaning sort of aim, is actually causing issues across the globe with people's health, wellness, blood sugar management, calorific management and the amount of nutrition they get from their base food.
words.defineEn: describing food which is high in calories
words.defineVi: mô tả thực phẩm có nhiều calo

words.defineEn: conveying something whilst using a very small number of words
words.defineVi: truyền đạt một cái gì đó trong khi sử dụng một số lượng rất nhỏ các từ

examples: And hey, definitely don’t underestimate platonic cuddling.

words.defineVi: thoát khỏi ham muốn thể xác

examples: But it’s also important to remember that regular soldiers often had more prosaic reasons for going off to fight, as you will eventually learn when you are forced to read The Red Badge of Courage, Goldfield tells the story of one Alabamian who enlisted only after his girlfriend mailed him a dress and told him he should start wearing if he wasn’t willing to go fight.
words.defineEn: plain and ordinary; lacking excitement and imagination
words.defineVi: đơn giản và bình thường; thiếu hứng thú và trí tưởng tượng

examples: It's the world's largest Gothic cathedral.

I have a PhD in literature and a fascination with the gothic in horror.
Here, the word Gothic was repurposed again to describe a literary genre that emerged as a darker strain of Romanticism.
words.defineEn: (of a novel, etc.) written or made in a way relating to the Goths
words.defineVi: (của một cuốn tiểu thuyết, v.v.) được viết hoặc làm theo cách liên quan đến người Goth

examples: It is a little bit esoteric.

words.defineEn: intended to be understood and known by a small group of people who possess a specific type of knowledge

examples: Now, yes, it is very true that a boring meeting or lecture, especially in the afternoon, may be soporific.

But do you know who really loved their eugenics?
words.defineEn: pertaining to or causing improvement in the offspring produced
words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc gây ra sự cải thiện ở thế hệ con cái được tạo ra

examples: The sports team played better on their home field than when they were away, showing that birds in their little nests agree also applies to team dynamics in competitive settings.

Fluid dynamics are awesome.
Fluid dynamics is freakin' complicated.
words.defineEn: determined and having a lot of energy and new ideas
words.defineVi: quyết tâm và có nhiều năng lượng và ý tưởng mới

examples: And this obliteration of fact from fiction, of truth from lie, has become now endemic in American politics.
And this obliteration of fact from fiction, of truth from lie, has become now endemic in American politics.
Plague, Ebola, anthrax, tuberculosis and HIV are all endemic here.
These peaceful herbivores are endemic to the Galapagos Islands, and are probably descended from a South American iguana that somehow drifted over and adapted to a watery lifestyle.
Some of the last endemic countries like South Sudan are aiming to be completely guinea worm free by 2020.
words.defineEn: relating to a disease or condition that is commonly found in a specific area or group of people

examples: And mnemonics can take many forms.

words.defineEn: relating to or aiding the memory, often by using memory-enhancing techniques or devices

examples: Today I'm going to talk to you about histrionic personality disorder.
